summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1580, for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue North, from the south line of Coulter's Addition to East Thomas Street; Thirty-seventh Avenue North, from East John Street to High Lane; East John Street, from Thirty-sixth Avenue North to Thirty-seventh Avenue North, by laying sewers and water mains, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16855 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
